sentence: Why was the floppy disk self-conscious? because it was fat.
explanation: In one context, fat describes having a large amount of body mass.
first_new_sentence: The elephant has a fat trunk that stores food.

sentence: What do you call a corvette following a camaro at high speeds? chevy chase.
explanation: In one context, chase refers to pursuing someone or something.
first_new_sentence: The police were in a high-speed chase after the fleeing suspect.
second_new_sentence: She decided to chase her dreams of becoming a singer.
